name: Drop2comp
description: Its an easy way to send or get files, documents or pictures from your Android to any PC nearby. Data cable is not required. You need just an internet connection and WiFi.  * Simple and easy, just scan QR-code via this app. * Send and receive files, documents, pictures * Once installed app - transfer files to anyone * No USB cable * No login and passwords during transferring * No required to configure * No required extra programs on PC  Launch an internet browser on your computer and open drop2comp.com Then choose a file on your phone in any convenient way (using gallery or file manager) and tap on Share via . Choose Add to drop2comp in the opened list. Then scan QR-code from the web page you have opened yet. Wait until download will complete.  Or, launch app drop2comp, tap on the browse button and choose the file. Scan QR-code and wait until download will complete.  Similarly, you can get any file from your computer.  If your phone and computer included in the same local network then the size of transferring files not taken into account.
